summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East Forty-second Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast; Fourteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-second Street to East Fifty-second Street, and Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-second Street to East Forty-fifth Street, and on the west side of Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street to East Fiftieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks, together with wooden crosswalks and all necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1677 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
